epic.title: User Interface Design
epic.description: Enhance the application's UI to provide a modern, visually appealing, intuitive, responsive, and accessible user experience across devices and browsers.

stories.title: Design and Implement Modern UI
stories.description: Create a consistent, responsive, and accessible UI that aligns with approved brand guidelines, enhances usability, and meets performance and compatibility standards.
acceptanceCriteria: UI follows a consistent color scheme, typography, and iconography as per approved brand guidelines.
All screens are responsive and render correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices in both portrait and landscape modes.
Navigation is intuitive with clear labels, icons, and logical menu structures.
UI components load within 2 seconds on standard broadband connection under normal load.
All interactive elements meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards, including keyboard navigation and screen reader support.
Cross-browser compatibility verified for latest two versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
Error messages and system feedback are clear, concise, and follow the application's tone of voice.
UI passes usability testing with at least 80% task completion rate by test participants.

tasks.title: Review and finalize brand guidelines
tasks.description: Obtain and confirm color palettes, typography, and iconography styles to be used.

tasks.title: Create UI mockups and prototypes
tasks.description: Design screen layouts for responsive breakpoints, incorporating brand guidelines.

tasks.title: Develop responsive UI components
tasks.description: Build reusable components using frontend framework with responsive design principles.

tasks.title: Implement accessibility features
tasks.description: Ensure all interactive elements meet WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, including ARIA attributes, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support.

tasks.title: Integrate UI with backend APIs
tasks.description: Consume backend API endpoints to display dynamic content correctly.

tasks.title: Conduct cross-browser testing
tasks.description: Verify UI functionality and layout in latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.

tasks.title: Perform performance optimization
tasks.description: Optimize images, reduce scripts and CSS size to ensure loading within 2 seconds.

tasks.title: Run usability testing
tasks.description: Engage test participants to perform defined tasks and achieve at least 80% success rate.
